code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{API_BASE_URL}from'../config';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchBar=()=>{const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState('');const[results,setResults]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState('');const handleSearch=async()=>{if(!searchTerm.trim())return;setLoading(true);setError('');try{const response=await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}/search/article/${encodeURIComponent(searchTerm)}`);const data=await response.json();setResults(data.results||[]);}catch(e){setError('Search failed.
